original_text: Even now the axe is laid to the root of the trees. Every tree therefore that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.”
korean_text: 이미 도끼가 나무 뿌리에 놓였으니 좋은 열매 맺지 아니하는 나무마다 찍혀 불에 던져지리라

sentences.original_text: Even now the axe is laid to the root of the trees.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금도 도끼가 나무 뿌리에 놓여 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Every tree therefore that does not bear good fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 좋은 열매를 맺지 않는 모든 나무는
